properties.name: Rul Undrak
properties.info: Carved into the side of the volcanic Mount Ulzanos, Rul Undrak is a settlement established after numerous failed attempts by the Ziril'udor to colonize the Kazgrim Mountains.

properties.name: Felrast
properties.info: Felrast is the ancestral home of runesmithing in Dol Obok. The city has far more runesmiths per capita than any other city in Ulfwyst, and many dwarf artisans from across the continent are either natives of the city or apprenticed there in their youth.

properties.name: Rul Orodum
properties.info: Rul Orodum is a dwarven keep located under Mount Kadrin high above the Desolate Wastes. The fortress serves as the gateway to the vast underground road networks of Dol Obok

properties.name: Thellodur
properties.info: The city of Thellodur is the capital of Dol Obok Centrally located in the Pillars of Amud, the city is connected to the rest of the dwarven kingdom by a series of underground passageways carved millenia ago by giants that used to rule the peaks.

properties.name: Lanok Duraz
properties.info: Lanok Duraz is a dwarven hold which spans between the twin peaks of Mount Gorzul and Mount Runthoz.

properties.name: Isidar Hreth
properties.info: The dwarven hold of Isidar Hreth contains the largest library of dwarven tomes and histories in Ulfwyst. Every book regarding family lineage, smithing techniques, military tactics or slights against dwarf-kind is copied down and storied in its vaults.

properties.name: Barak Ulgrum
properties.info: The dwarf fortress of Barak Ulgrum sits alot the largest silver desposits ever discovered in the Pillars of Amud. The silver is mined, and smelted into ingots before being transported under heavy guard to the great halls of the thanes.

properties.name: Zul Baraz
properties.info: The dwarven hold of Zul Baraz guards Black Dragon Pass, one of the few natural passages into the Pillars of Amud.

properties.name: Barak Azgal
properties.info: A legendary dwarven hold, Barak Azgal was lost centuries ago. Before its fall to invaders from the Underdark, the city was renowned for its vast gold despoits and architectural marvels.

properties.name: Kazdan Ord
properties.info: Kazdan Ord is an independent dwarven hold allied with the city-states of the Barrier Coast. Many of the greatest dwarven smiths of this age have studied the time-honored traditions of armor, weapon and rune smithing at its great forges.

properties.name: Izor Kheluz
properties.info: Izor Kheluz is a relatively new hold by dwarven standards, having been founded only 200 years ago. The hold was build in and around the natural caverns under Mount Korlan, giving it a design unlike any other hold in Ulfwyst.

properties.name: Ezhekal
properties.info: Ezhekal is a dwarven hold located under Mount Skarvîr. The hold is known for its focus on science and engineering. Many technological advancements in dwarven engineering have begun in the workshops of Ezhekal.

properties.name: Thuryn Zul
properties.info: The town of Thuryn Zul is a dwarf hold under Mount Hunkir in the Zavalev Mountains. The town is located over a huge cavern that descends deep into the Underdark.

properties.name: Fûthmér
properties.info: The dwarf city of Fûthmér is located atop Mount Karulam, the highest mountain in the Zavalev range. From this vantage point, the gryphon riders of Fûthmér are able to take flight and patrol the dangerous mountain passes and the wild Damali Steppe.

properties.name: Maraz Drul
properties.info: Maraz Drul guards the Bricza Pass, one of the few safe passageways through the Jordonis Mountains. The dwarves of the hold have come into armed conflict with the peoples of Navolin, due to the high toll the dwarves place on the use of the pass.

properties.name: Vol Volund
properties.info: Vol Volund is a independent dwarven town founded as a home for dwarves who have been banished, or left other holds in disgrace. These reculsive dwarves rarely allow outsiders beyond the Gate of Rundgral.

properties.name: Kadren Zul
properties.info: Kadren Zul is an independent dwarf hold allied with the Realm of Cibrin. The dwarf lords of the city have extensive trade agreements with the clans of Cibrin, for whom they supply a large amount of weapons and armor.

properties.name: Ankor Duraz
properties.info: The dwarven city is located under Mount Certunsk in the Torick Peaks. The expansive mines under the city have made it one of the richest dwarven holds in Ulfwyst.
